full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 164 of 236 LC3KMAX6 Parkinson - Direct MS. COMEY: Let's go now to 276. What do we see here? A. This is the master bedroom, second floor, you're standing to the west. MS. COMEY: Let's go now to 277. A. This is part of the master bedroom, and you're looking -- standing at the west, looking to the east. Q. Mr. Parkinson, I'd like you to turn in your binder to what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibit 278. Would you please take a look at that and tell us if you recognize it. A. I do. Q. What is it? A. This is the master shower room, located on the second floor. It is due east of where the master bed is. Q. Does this fairly and accurately depict a portion of the interior of 358 El Brillo Way as it appeared on October 20, 2005? A. True. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers this under seal to protect the privacy of third parties. MS. STERNHEIM: Judge, may I approach, please? THE COURT: We'll break for mid-afternoon break for the jury. We'll resume in about 15 minutes, members of the jury. Thank you. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012678
